summary: Worker times out when attempting graceful shutdown via Ctrl-C. This issue affects the shutdown process of the TypeScript SDK worker, making it difficult to cleanly stop workers.
userImpact: Users cannot gracefully shut down workers via Ctrl-C without experiencing timeouts, affecting operational workflows.
resolutionDetails: Resolved through implementation of proper shutdown handling in the worker (likely merged with #58 referenced in the issue).
keyQuote: Easily reproducible via starting a worker and hitting Ctrl-C.
